sentences: Ajas mu vastust kuuldes silmad suureks.
Ta tegi suureid silmi kui nägi kingitust.
context: The word 'suureks' is the illative singular form of 'suur' (big/great) used in the expression 'silmad suureks aja/t tegema' which means to open one's eyes wide or make big eyes, typically showing surprise, astonishment, or amazement. It literally means 'to make eyes big' and is commonly used when someone is surprised by something they see or hear.
